name: The Omega Stone: Sequel to the Riddle of the Sphinx
name_original: The Omega Stone: Sequel to the Riddle of the Sphinx
description:
The Omega Stone: Sequel to the Riddle of the Sphinx is an adventure game developed by Omni Adventures. It came out on 18-03-2003. It was published by The Adventure Company.
The Omega Stone: Sequel to the Riddle of the Sphinx is available on PC.
